alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued January 02 at 6:55PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE NORTHWEST AVALANCHE CENTER. * WHAT...HIGH AVALANCHE DANGER WILL DEVELOP SUNDAY NIGHT AND MONDAY IN THE WARNING AREAS. * WHERE...THE MT HOOD AREA AND THE EAST SLOPES OF THE WASHINGTON CASCADES SOUTH OF I-90. * WHEN...IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM PST SUNDAY, JANUARY 2 THROUGH 6 PM PST MONDAY, JANUARY 3. * IMPACTS...HEAVY SNOW AND EXTREME WINDS WILL CREATE VERY DANGEROUS AVALANCHE CONDITIONS THROUGH MONDAY. LARGE AVALANCHES ARE VERY LIKELY. * PRECAUTIONARY / PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...BACKCOUNTRY TRAVEL IS NOT RECOMMENDED. AVOID TRAVELLING IN AREAS WHERE LARGE AVALANCHE CAN RUN, START OR STOP. CONSULT HTTPS://WWW.NWAC.US/ OR WWW.AVALANCHE.ORG FOR MORE DETAILED INFORMATION.
